sentences.cn: 他正在即席翻译一篇东西.

sentences.en: He slipped on a dark cloak and went after her, unseen.
sentences.cn: 他穿上一件黑斗篷,悄悄地跟在她后边.

sentences.en: I slipped from the room unseen, ie unnoticed.
sentences.cn: 我悄悄地溜出房间, 无人察觉.

sentences.en: Now and again the hunter can hear a long - draw dolorous whine of some unseen coyote.
sentences.cn: 猎人不时能听见某只看不见的小林狼发出的拖长的哀嚎.

sentences.en: Raj crept out of the house unseen.
sentences.cn: 拉杰悄悄地溜出了房子。

sentences.en: The forest was dark and silent, haunted by shadows and unseen presences.
sentences.cn: 这个森林黑暗寂静，经常有幽灵和看不见的鬼怪出没。

sentences.en: The quail were walking around like pullets, seeming all dainty and unseen.
sentences.cn: 雏鸡似的鹌鹑在周围漫步,一副旁若无人的神气, 十分娇美.

sentences.en: The unseen ferry - boat was blowing blast after blast.
sentences.cn: 那看不见的渡船,一阵又一阵地发出汽笛声.

sentences.en: There was barely time for the two boys to escape unseen.
sentences.cn: 两个男孩想趁人不备偷偷溜走几乎是来不及的。

sentences.en: There were unseen dangers from every side for the travellers.
sentences.cn: 旅行者的四周到处潜伏着危险.

sentences.en: There were unseen dangers from every side of the travelers.
sentences.cn: 旅客的四周到处潜伏着危险.

sentences.en: They are the pawns in the power game played by their unseen captors.
sentences.cn: 他们是那些看不见的俘获者手中的权力斗争工具。

sentences.en: To this something still unseen they gave the name radium.
sentences.cn: 他们给这种人们尚未看到的东西命名为镭.

sentences.en: We bought the table sight unseen and were pleased to find it was perfect for our kitchen.
sentences.cn: 我们事先没看就买下了那张桌子,发现放在厨房里合适极了,这使我们很高兴.

sentences.en: We print a selection of previously unseen photos from the Spanish rider's early years.
sentences.cn: 我们选了这位西班牙骑手早年一些不为人知的照片刊登出来。

sentences.en: You should never buy a car sight unseen.
sentences.cn: 买汽车时,事先未检查可千万不要买.

words.tran_cn: 看不见的，未看见的；未经预习的

trans.tran_cn: 看不见的，未看见的，未事先过目的，即席的
